Name: VR GAME-Brick of War 魔块战争
About the game: VR GAME-Brick Of War is an VR shooting game that is suitable for any age player,Players need to challenge monsters from all sides in the game. There are plenty of monsters and they have different forms of attack. Players have to defeat the biggest boss of monster yet,fortunately it will fall a lot of auxiliary props in the game while players are playing. Players can win the game if they are using weapons and props.
